thread.title: Great boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Great boutique hotel - Review of Cosmopolitan Hotel - Tribeca, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jennyg776524
title: Great boutique hotel
text: Small boutique hotel in Tribeca, really enjoyed the location, walkable to lots of tourist spots such as the 9/11 Memorial and Museum and the Brooklyn Bridge. Room was small, but we did not need a lot of space and had all the amenities you would need, so I didn't mind. Very nice bathroom, all subway tiles and very clean. I would definitely recommend if you are looking to stay in that neighborhood, very close to the subway and staff were incredibly nice. Would stay here again.
